subject: Lucas
description_text:
Hi,

I’m Lucas, CEO of VanChat. Many of our customers first discovered VanChat through an email—just like you. Most of them later told us, “I didn’t expect it to be this good.”

A Shopify store owner selling wine thought installation would be complicated, but it took only a few minutes. VanChat (https://vanchat.io/?ref=uk3) immediately reduced his customer support load and boosted conversions. He said, “I discovered VanChat—it was exactly what I needed.”

Another store owner in the health supplements business mentioned how intuitive the interface was, but what impressed him most was the care behind it: “I even had a personal call with the founder – rare these days!”

That’s what VanChat stands for: quick setup, real impact, lower costs, and genuine support.
If you’d like to experience it yourself, book a quick demo (https://calendly.com/vanchat/demo_ist-clone) or message me on WhatsApp: +1 650-705-7837.

Best,  Lucas  |  Founder & CEO @VanChat

https://www.linkedin.com/in/lucas-vanchat/
